name: finishing, textile, woven cotton | finishing, textile, woven cotton | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19849/documentation

Data collected from mostly vertically integrated mills on a global level. The activity begins with dyed, woven cotton and ends with cotton finished. It includes electricity use and chemicals (softeners, water repellents, wrinkle resist, flame retardants, catalysts, etc). It does not include the cotton fibres.

The activity begins with dyed, woven cotton. 

The activity ends with cotton fabric finished and dryed. The dataset needs to be used with 1kg of fabric
category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1313:Finishing of textiles

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data collected from mostly vertically integrated mills on a global level (Eurasia, East Asia, South/Central Asia, and Latin America).
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Extrapolated from data from mostly vertically integrated mills.
